title: Deepkabcut training automatically stopped at Iteration200000

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

My training model automatically stopped at Iteration 200000, which i set it to be at 500000 innitially. However, at the end it still shows that "The network is now trained and ready to evaluate." How can I fix it?
(By the way the loss is just 0.0010, or is this the reason why it stops automatically?) 

### Operating System

Linux Ubuntu

### DeepLabCut version

2.2.1.1

### DeepLabCut mode

multi animal

### Device type

gpu Nvidia 3060

### Steps To Reproduce

1.Click training data sets and wait for several hours.
when it runs to Iteration 200000, it automatically stopped.


### Relevant log output

```shell
iteration: 198000 loss: 0.0010 scmap loss: 0.0009 locref loss: 0.0000 limb loss: 0.0001 lr: 1e-05
iteration: 199000 loss: 0.0010 scmap loss: 0.0009 locref loss: 0.0000 limb loss: 0.0001 lr: 1e-05
iteration: 200000 loss: 0.0010 scmap loss: 0.0009 locref loss: 0.0000 limb loss: 0.0001 lr: 1e-05
2022-07-20 23:22:20.459561: W tensorflow/core/kernels/queue_base.cc:277] _0_fifo_queue: Skipping cancelled enqueue attempt with queue not closed
Exception in thread Thread-1:
Traceback (most recent call last):

    return fn(*args)
```

### Anything else?

No
